TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of documents discovered during XML Web services discovery that have been downloaded to the client. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> property of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol> is of type DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection.
## Examples The following code example enacts XML Web service discovery and downloads the discovered documents to the client. The names of the discovery documents within the DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection are output to the console.
[!code-cs[DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.web.services.di_2_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.web.services.di_2_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[DiscoveryClientDocumentCollection2#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.services.di_2_1.vb)]
